text: kUqrmO madhuq vAtA# RutAyaqta iti# daqddhnA ma#dhumiqSrENAqBya#nakti svaqdaya#tyEqvaina#M grAqmyaM ~MvA EqtadannaqM ~Myad-daddhyA#raqNyaM madhuq yaddaqddhnA ma#dhumiqSrENA$ ByaqnaktyuqBayaqsyA &va#ruddhyai maqhI dyauH pRu#thiqvI ca# naq ityA#hAq &&ByAmEqvaina#muBaqyataqH pari#gRuhNAtiq prA~jcaqmupa# dadhAti suvaqrgasya# lOqkasyaq sama#ShTyai puqrastA$t praqtya~jcaqmupa# dadhAtiq tasmA$t - [  ] 46
